titleStmt.title: The Societie of the Rosary. Newly augmented
titleStmt.author: Garnet, Henry, 1555-1606.

titleStmt.title: The Societie of the Rosary. Newly augmented
titleStmt.author: Garnet, Henry, 1555-1606.
Clement VIII, Pope, 1536-1605.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Fr. Garnet's second press,

notesStmt.note: "An epistle consolatory: of an auncient Pope. To the Catholicks of Albania" by Pope Clement VIII, in English and Latin, has separate title page, pagination, and register.
The last two leaves are blank.
Identified as STC 21319 on UMI microfilm reel 394, and as STC 19939a on reel 1149; Epistle consolatory identified as STC 10430a on reel 643.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Appears at reel 394 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy), at reel 643 (Epistle consolatory only, Folger Shakespeare Library copy), and at reel 1149 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy).
